name: The Rag 1-Year Subscription
description: Save by purchasing a 1-year subscription to The Rag. We publish biannually. You can download our 5th issue immediately, and you'll also receive our 6th issue when it comes out this summer. You can read more about our current and past issues by visiting our website raglitmag.com When your purchase is complete, you can download the files instantly. The download is a zip file that includes the PDF, EPUB and MOBI versions of Issue #5. Issue #6 will be emailed to you on the release date. EPUB is the recommended format for tablets, smart phones and e-readers, the PDF is ideal for PC/MAC users and the MOBI is for Kindle users. For a limited time, you can add on a bundle of our first 4 issues for only $6 if you purchase the Subscription and Bundle together. Enter the discount code BUNDLE1 at checkout.

name: Issue Bundle - Year #1
description: Get the first four of issues of The Rag for only $8. The download is a zip file that includes the PDF, EPUB and MOBI versions of The Rag's first four quarterly releases. EPUB is the recommended format for tablets, smart phones and e-readers, the PDF is ideal for PC/MAC users and the MOBI is for Kindle users. You can read more about the issues included in this bundle on our website.

name: The Rag Fan T-shirt
description:
For a limited time, if you purchase the t-shirt, get Issue #5 for free. Add the t-shirt and Issue #5 to your cart and enter the code TSHIRT at checkout. 

Be ultra cool and sport your favorite e-zine t-shirt in charcoal grey. 

• Men’s short sleeve t-shirt.
• Crew neckline.
• screen-print logo on left chest.
• Preshrunk.
• 100% Cotton.
• Standard fit.

name: The Rag #5 Winter/Spring 2013
description: The Rag's 5th issue is now out. This is our first issue as a biannual publication and has about twice as much content as our previous quarterly releases. Many stories featured here examine questions of good and evil and what drives people to act immorally. When your purchase is complete, you can download the files instantly and start reading now. The download is a zip file that includes the PDF, EPUB and MOBI versions of Issue #5. EPUB is the recommended format for tablets, smart phones and e-readers, the PDF is ideal for PC/MAC users and the MOBI is for Kindle users.

name: The Rag #4 Summer 2012
description: The Rag's 4th issue is now out. Featuring stories and poetry that take risks and push the limits of literature, it's one that can't be missed. You can read more about this issue on our blog. Download and start reading now. The download includes the PDF and EPUB versions of the summer issue. Why stop at one issue, when you can get two? Enter the discount code COMBO at checkout to get $1 off any combo order, so that's two issues for only $4.98.

name: The Rag #3 Spring 2012
description: The spring season, with its connotations of rebirth and renewal, would seem like a good time for The Rag to show a kinder, gentler side. Perhaps that’s why the selections in this issue focus on family life … albeit with a distinctly Rag-ish twist. Parent-child, husband-wife: these relationships are examined, twisted, and perverted until the gritty underbelly of family life is fully exposed. Download and start reading now. The Spring download includes the PDF and EPUB versions of The Rag. Why stop at one issue, when you can get two? Enter the discount code COMBO at checkout to get $1 off any combo order, so that's two issues for only $4.98.

name: The Rag #2 Winter 2012
description: Power and control. This theme is present in many of the winter selections and is visualized the fullest in Garth von Buchholz' sci-fi story "Make Mad the Roaring Winds," which follows Darcy Lim, a human resources officer who's wrapping up a very long commute--a 3-year journey to a colony on one of Jupiter's moons. Trapped in his solitary space capsule on an immoveable trajectory towards its destination, Darcy's fighting to gain a modicum of control over his life and destiny, and suicide or insanity have come to look like decent options. Download and start reading now. The Winter download includes the PDF and EPUB versions of The Rag. Why stop at one issue, when you can get two? Enter the discount code COMBO at checkout to get $1 off any combo order, so that's two issues for only $4.98.

name: The Rag #1 Fall 2011
description: See where it all started with The Rag's first issue. Contained inside Fall 2011 are 9 short stories full of wit, twisted humor and original characters. The selections in the first issue have a criminal bent, with a touch of noir, but moreover they chronicle the death of the American Dream. With no hope for a better future, the characters are fighting with society and themselves, and it's these battles that make these stories compelling. Download and start reading now. The Fall download includes the PDF and EPUB versions of The Rag. EPUB is the recommended format for tablets, smart phones and e-readers, while the PDF is ideal for PC/MAC users. Why stop at one issue, when you can get two? Enter the discount code COMBO at checkout to get $1 off any combo order, and purchase two issues for only $4.98
